 my_string.enumerated()
            .filter{ $0.offset % m == c - 1}
            .map { String($0.element) }
            .joined()



ğŸ’¡Answer 01

import Foundation

func solution(_ my_string:String, _ m:Int, _ c:Int) -> String {

    return my_string.enumerated()
            .filter{ $0.offset % m == c - 1}
            .map { String($0.element) }
            .joined()
            
}



í•´ë‹¹ë¬¸ì œ í’€ëŸ¬ê°€ë³´ê¸°
